module.name: lvm
module.summary: Policy for logical volume management programs.

interface.name: lvm_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute lvm programs in the lvm domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: lvm_run
interface.summary: Execute lvm programs in the lvm domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the LVM domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the LVM domain to use.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
